reviewText:
My grandchildren loves Max and Ruby.  We love the relationship between the older sister and the younger brother rabbit.  It teaches children.  We like that!

My grand daughter is nine and my grandson is 3 but she will sit down with him and look at Max's and Ruby.

We appreciate that.
The kids love the show. I love the innocence of it. I don't have to worry about exposing my kids to violence or an overwhelming scary concept while they watch Max and ruby.
